articles.title: Sodexo First half Fiscal 2025 results
articles.description: At the Board of Directors meeting held on April 03, 2025, chaired by Sophie Bellon, the Board approved the consolidated financial statements for the First half Fiscal 2025 ended February 28, 2025.

articles.title: Actor-director Manoj Kumar passes away at 87 after prolonged illness
articles.description:

articles.title: Marico Q4 revenue growth beats estimates; Morgan Stanley sets target price at ₹625
articles.description: Marico Limited reported high-teen consolidated revenue growth for the fourth quarter ended March 31, 2025. Morgan Stanley has given an Equal-weight call on Marico with a target price of ₹625 per share.

articles.title: Indian and New Zealand navies involved in $181m drug bust in Indian Ocean
articles.description: The New Zealand-led naval task force in the Indian Ocean continues to seize hauls of illegal drugs with an Indian Navy frigate the latest to intercept smugglers, recovering more than 2.5 tonnes of heroin and hashish.
